extendedInfo.description: A port of Stratagus real-time strategy gaming engine for Android.Can be used to play several games, including:Wargus - Warcraft II: Tides of Darkness & Beyond the Dark Portal (expansion pack) clone, which uses content from original Blizzard games CDs.Stargus - partial Starcraft I clone, also uses content from original CD.You will need to provide 'game data files' to actually play anything, for help on creating data, please visit  - http://stratagus.drodin.comIn game controls: 'Menu' button to display menu with options for redefine keys. Long press 'Menu' button to invoke on-screen keyboard.* Warcraft and Starcraft are registered trademarks of Blizzard Entertainment.

reviews.title: WOW!
reviews.comment: Not working on Nexus 7, unfortunately. I start a campaign and it closes automatically.
reviews.author: Felipe Caldas

reviews.title: Droid X and this work fine.
reviews.comment: Simply follow the directions and this app is incredible. Seriously it should easily have 250,000+ downloads. Awesome job to the developers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs update.
reviews.comment: Awsome! Runs flawlessly on my galaxy s, but not at all on galaxy s2 ICS. PLEASE UPDATE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: I\'ve been playing Warcraft II using Wargus for ages, on my galaxy nexus and my HTC incredible. Wargus and Stratagus worked on my HTC incredible with a single core processor half a gig of ram and a tiny screen.  It was unbearably slow & intermittently force close but worked the majority of the time. The reason I give it a single star is that Stratagus doesn\'t work at all on my dual core galaxy nexus with a gig of ram. It works fine until the game would start and some menus then just closes. 5 stars if fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t get it to work
reviews.comment: Followed all the instructions perfectly when starcraft runs I get a choice....it says only multiplayer works so when I loaded it it says waiting for players and nothing happens past that... I can\'t add an AI player so if I try single player it loads after I click start game but fc right away... anyone know how to fix this?   Galaxy SIII
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WC2 & SC1 on my phone! Ty
reviews.comment: While it\'s not a production quality game, this is a must have for strategy fans. Visit the author\'s home page for help installing and obtaining the data.wc2 & data.sc1 stuff. Simple enough... WC2 runs very good, SC1 runs alright too. No Sound & no way to screen scroll left/right/up/down (but able to navigate using mini-map.) Tested using HTC EVO 3D.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My saves...
reviews.comment: I want to give it 5 stars but it won\'t load my save games. Can anyone explain why?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I can\'t wait until there is sound, great work! Big levels tend to freeze-up, save often, and stop as many characters as possible and it won\'t freeze.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Okay this is just straight up AWESOME! for SC I hope you drop the start money. It seems the comp doesnt get the inital 50K or know what to do with it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wonderful but...
reviews.comment: My fav. oldies games. Bravo! Good Effort! Thanks. It works on warcraft 2, it run smooth but frequent Force Close. Whereas with starcraft, I cannot select the \"Campaign Game\". The Icon Box for it is not even highlighted yellow as the others do. And when I click on it nothing happens. The \"Single Player Game\" can be played though. I use Starcraft v1.05 CD, & the Stargus-1.0-android.exe to extract it. The extraction was succesfully completed. Hope the developer can fix it, the FC & add the fx sound too.
reviews.author: Renaldi Kamaluddin

reviews.comment: 4stars for trying.. tons of bugs controls don\'t work so well.. could def use some polishing.. droid x
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 5 stars for the effort. Keep up the good work, it\'s going to be a smash when all bugs get fixed :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The engine is super fast while still looking crisp, however not really playable without real keyboard (right click & screen scrolling)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Why can\'t I download wargus or stargus?! When I click on them, it just brings me to a page full of code!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fail on s3
reviews.comment: Doesnt work on galaxy s3 the gane start both of them starcraft and w2 but when time to load a scenario the program close
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This works, don\'t listen to the haters.
reviews.comment: The only reason this wouldn\'t work is if you didn\'t read the instructions. Apart from a few technicalities, Stratagus works perfectly even on my crappy Samsung Intercept. I just hope there are a few more updates in the near future.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need help
reviews.comment: So I put the game data in and when I hit start game nothin happens and it just closes. Plz help  Galaxy Nexus
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on Droid X. Developer hasn\'t updated since launch, insults bug reporters and posts his own 5 star reviews. Nuff said.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worth a try
reviews.comment: Runs on my Atrix 4G, but crashes out after starting a game on transformer prime. Great effort though - keep trying!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works decently
reviews.comment: It\'s a decent way to run warcraft 2. However there\'s no audio. I\'d suggest to those interested to get turbo dos, download war 2 on your phone. Go into options and select use 64 mb on the turbo dos menu. Further instructions on dosbox website. That way it runs decently and has sound.
reviews.author: A Google User
